articles.author: Michelle Townsend
articles.title: Country music star Jake Flint dies suddenly aged 37 just hours after his wedding - RSVP Live
articles.description: American singer-songwriter Jake Flint passed away in his sleep, shortly after marrying his wife beloved Brenda on Saturday, his publicist Cliff Doyal has confirmed
articles.content:
American country music star Jake Flint has died suddenly at age 37 after his wedding.
The singer-songwriter passed away in his sleep shortly after marrying his wife Brenda on Saturday, his publicist… [+2098 chars]

articles.title: Iran 0-1 USA: Christian Pulisic goal gives Americans victory to snatch second place in Group B - Eurosport COM
articles.description: Christian Pulisic scored a first-half winner and injured himself in the process as the United States earned a 1-0 win over Iran to reach World Cup last 16.
articles.content: Christian Pulisic of United States scores their team's first goal during the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 Group B match between IR Iran and USA at Al Thumama Stadium on November 29, 2022 in Doha, Qatar.… [+62 chars]
